title: Child, Venison, Subject, Gaea
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

The nuns treat me as a Child,
Sweet,
Young,
Something to protect,
They wish to keep me to themselves



The men treat me as Venison
“Sweet”
“Young”
Something to consume
They wish to keep me to themselves



The scholars treat me as Subject
-Sweet
-Young
Something to measure
They wish to keep me to themselves



He treats me as "████".
Sweet.
Young.
Something to forget.
He wished he could keep me.
author: Fenmoth
